response.name: Spinach and Feta Quiche
response.ingredients:
Ingredients:
-1 9-inch pre-made pie crust
-3 large eggs
-3/4 cup half-and-half
-1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese
-2 cups fresh spinach, chopped
-1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
-1/3 cup chopped cherry tomatoes
-1/4 cup onion, diced
-1/4 teaspoon salt
-1/4 teaspoon pepper
-1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
response.instructions:
Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F.
2. Place the pre-made pie crust in a 9-inch round pie plate.
3. In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs and half-and-half. Stir in the feta cheese, spinach, mozzarella cheese, cherry tomatoes, onion, salt, and pepper.
4. Pour the egg mixture into the pre-made pie crust. Sprinkle the top with the Parmesan cheese.
5. Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes, until the center is set and a knife inserted in the middle comes out clean.
6. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy!

response.name: Mediterranean Stuffed Chicken
response.ingredients:
Ingredients
 - 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts 
 - 2 Tablespoons olive oil
 - 2 cloves garlic, minced 
 - 2 cups fresh spinach, chopped
 - 1/4 cup feta cheese 
 - 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, chopped 
 - Salt and pepper, to taste
 - 2 Tablespoons fresh basil, chopped 
 - 2 Tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped
response.instructions:
Instructions
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Place the chicken breasts in a baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil. 
In a medium skillet, heat the remaining olive oil over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. 
Add the spinach and cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until the spinach has wilted. 
Mix in the feta cheese, tomatoes, salt and pepper. Remove from heat and stir in the fresh basil and parsley. 
Stuff the cooked spinach mixture into the chicken breasts. Season with additional salt and pepper. 
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.

response.name: Lemony Spinach Feta Salad
response.ingredients:
Ingredients 
- 4 cups baby spinach 
- ½ cup diced cherry tomatoes 
- ¼ cup crumbled Feta cheese 
- 2 tablespoons olive oil 
- 1 tablespoon lemon juice 
- 1 teaspoon honey 
- ½ teaspoon oregano 
- ¼ teaspoon garlic powder 
- salt and pepper to taste
response.instructions:
Instructions
Combine spinach, tomatoes and feta cheese in a large bowl. 
In a small bowl whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, honey, oregano, garlic powder, salt and pepper. 
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine. 
Serve immediately and enjoy!

response.name: Quinoa Chicken and Broccoli Bowl
response.ingredients:
Ingredients
- 2 cups cooked quinoa
- 1 cup diced cooked chicken
- 1 cup cooked broccoli florets
- 1/4 cup diced red onion
- 1/4 cup diced red bell pepper
- 1/4 cup sliced almonds
- 2 Tablespoons olive oil
- 2 Tablespoons low-sodium soy sauce
- 2 Tablespoons apple cider vinegar
- 1 Tablespoon honey 
- Salt and pepper (to taste)
response.instructions:
Instructions
In a large bowl, mix together quinoa, chicken, broccoli, onion, bell pepper, and almonds.
In a separate small bowl, whisk together olive oil, soy sauce, vinegar, honey, and salt and pepper.
Add the dressing mixture to the quinoa mixture and stir until evenly combined.
Serve immediately.

response.name: Delicious Chicken Broccoli Quinoa Bowl
response.ingredients:
Ingredients
 - 1 cup quinoa
 - 2 cups chicken broth 
 - 1 tablespoon olive oil
 - 2 cups broccoli florets
 - 1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts
 - 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
 - Salt and pepper, to taste
 - 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice
 - 1 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese
 - 2 tablespoons toasted almonds or other nut of your choice
response.instructions:
Instructions
1. Rinse quinoa in a fine mesh sieve. Combine quinoa and chicken broth in a medium sized saucepan. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and cover. Cook for 15 minutes or until quinoa is tender. Set aside and fluff with a fork. 
2. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add broccoli and cook until crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Remove to a separate plate. 
3. Add chicken to the skillet and season with garlic powder, salt and pepper. Cook chicken for 5-6 minutes per side or until cooked through and no longer pink. Add lemon juice and cook for an additional minute. 
4. Divide cooked quinoa and broccoli among 4 bowls. Top with chicken, Parmesan cheese, and toasted nuts. Enjoy!

response.name: Delicious Chicken Quinoa Stir-Fry
response.ingredients:
Ingredients
 - 1/4 cup quinoa, uncooked
 - 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into small cubes
 - 1/2 cup vegetable broth
 - 1 cup broccoli florets
 - 1/2 red onion, diced
 - 2 cloves of garlic, minced
 - 2 Tablespoons olive oil
 - 1 teaspoon ground ginger
 - 1 Tablespoon soy sauce
 - Salt and pepper to taste
response.instructions:
Instructions
 
1. Cook the quinoa according to package instructions, then set aside. 
2. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and onion and cook until the chicken is browned and cooked through (about 7-10 minutes). 
3. Add the garlic and cook for another minute. 
4. Add the vegetable broth, broccoli, quinoa, and ginger to the skillet and cook for an additional 5 minutes. 
5. Drizzle with the olive oil, soy sauce and stir to combine. 
6. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 
7. Serve warm.

response.name: Veggie Quinoa Bowl with Tofu
response.ingredients:
Ingredients
- 6 ounces extra-firm tofu
- 1 cup quinoa
- 2½ cups vegetable broth 
- 1 teaspoon olive oil 
- 1 onion, diced 
- 1 red bell pepper, diced 
- 1 cup broccoli florets 
- 1 cup mushrooms, sliced 
- 2 cloves garlic, minced 
- 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce 
- ½ teaspoon ground cumin
- 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning 
- Salt and pepper, to taste 
- ½ cup cherry tomatoes, halved 
- ¼ cup sliced green onions 
- 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro, chopped
response.instructions:
Instructions
1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Place the tofu onto a parchment-lined baking sheet. Brush each side of the tofu with olive oil, then sprinkle with Italian seasoning and salt and pepper. Bake for 20 minutes.
2. While the tofu is baking, cook the quinoa according to package instructions using the vegetable broth instead of water.
3. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and bell pepper and cook for 3 minutes. Add the broccoli, mushrooms, and garlic and cook for another 5 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.
4. Add the cooked quinoa to the skillet and mix with the vegetables. Add the soy sauce, cumin, salt, and pepper and cook, stirring often, for 5 more minutes.
5. Add the baked tofu, cherry tomatoes, sliced green onions, and chopped cilantro to the quinoa mixture and stir until everything is combined. Taste and adjust seasoning if needed.
6. Serve warm or cold, as desired. Enjoy!

response.name: Fried Chicken with Garlic, Onion and Bell Peppers
response.ingredients:
Ingredients 
- 4 boneless skinless chicken breast
- 2 cloves garlic, minced 
- 1 red onion, chopped 
- 1 red bell pepper, chopped 
- 1 green bell pepper, chopped 
- 1 teaspoon paprika 
- 2 tablespoons olive oil 
- Salt and pepper to taste
response.instructions:
Instructions 
1. Preheat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add olive oil. 
2. Add chicken and season with salt, pepper and paprika. Cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, until chicken is cooked through. Remove chicken and set aside.
3. To the skillet, add garlic, onion and bell peppers. Cook until softened, about 4-5 minutes. 
4. Reduce heat to medium-low and add chicken back to the skillet. Cook for an additional 3-4 minutes. 
5. Serve immediately.

response.name: Friend2
response.ingredients:
Ingredients
- 1 lb ground beef 
- 1 onion, diced 
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced 
- 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce 
- 2 teaspoons tomato paste 
- 1/4 teaspoon garlic salt 
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper 
- 8 ounces tomato sauce 
- 1/2 teaspoon oregano 
- 1/2 teaspoon basil 
- 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, minced 
- 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional) 
- 2  cups cooked long grain rice 
- 2 cups shredded cheese of choice (optional)
response.instructions:
Instructions
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add the ground beef. Cook the beef, stirring often, until it is browned about 8 minutes.
Add the diced onion and minced garlic to the beef and stir to combine. Cook until the onion is softened, about 5 minutes. 
Add the Worcestershire sauce, tomato paste, garlic salt, black pepper, tomato sauce, oregano, basil, and red pepper flakes. Stir together and bring the mixture to a simmer. Simmer the sauce for 10 minutes. 
Remove the skillet from heat and stir in cooked rice and parsley. 
Line a 9x13 baking dish with parchment paper or greased foil. Pour the beef and rice mixture into the dish and spread the mixture out evenly. Top with shredded cheese (optional). 
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly.

response.name: Friend3
response.ingredients:
Ingredients
- 12 ounces shrimp, cooked
- 2 avocados, diced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 limes, juiced
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 1 teaspoon cumin
- 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, finely chopped
- Salt and pepper to taste
response.instructions:
Instructions
1. Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and cook for about 1 minute, or until fragrant. 
2. Add the cooked shrimp and toss to coat. Cook the shrimp until it turns pink and opaque, about 4-5 minutes. 
3. Add the chili powder, cumin, and salt and pepper. Stir to combine and cook for 1-2 minutes. 
4. Add the diced avocado and lime juice. Stir the mixture and cook for an additional minute. 
5. Remove the skillet from the heat and add the fresh chopped cilantro. Stir to combine and serve.
response.nutrition:
Nutrition
Serving Size: 4 
Calories: 295 
Total Fat: 19g 
Saturated Fat: 2g 
Carbohydrates: 12g 
Fiber: 7g
Protein: 19g
